title: [Bug] Chroma's don't display name
body: I.e "Peridot" etc no longer appear in loading screen

replies.body:
Hey MThead - 

This was a conscious choice moving forward with chromas, since the names became extremely long, especially in languages other than English, and they'd bleed outside of the loading screen card. Chroma names like Dragonslayer Xin Zhao (Sandstone), for example, didn't work super well. D:
I believe that they stopped doing that for the gem named ones, only the ones like Koi Nami ELEMENT and Zac SWEET do that.
